source.sqlReaderQuery:
TRUNCATE TABLE ProductDetail_New

activities.name: Copy data from given table to data lake

properties.description: Get last modified date of each file in a folder and add this date to new column in the destination file
This pipeline copies the list of table data to txt files to data lake with file name same as table name

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT S.name AS SchemaName, T.name AS TableName
FROM [sys].Tables T 
JOIN SYS.schemas S
	ON T.schema_id = S.schema_id
WHERE Type = 'U'
	AND T.name NOT IN ('BuildVersion','ErrorLog')
